title: DllNotFoundException on Linux (Synology DSM)
body:
### Description

SkiaSharp crashes with DllNotFoundException on Linux (1.68.0 + Core 2.2). I'm pretty sure this has worked sometime but I can't verify that right now. I think that was running .NET Core 1.1 and I can't seem to create a 1.1 project at the moment. It works on Windows though.

### Repro steps (minimal project)

1. Create a new ASP.NET Web Core Application (empty, no ssl, no docker)
2. Add mvc-support
3. Add Nugets SkiaSharp and SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux
4. Add a controller that invokes SkiaSharp
5. Publish with VS Community 15.9.3 (release Linux-64) on Windows 10
6. Add a basic Docker-file
7. Copy files to Linux (Synology custom version based straight on Linux kernel)
8. Build and run with docker
9. Invoke controller, crash

### Exception message

The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKAbstractManagedStream' threw an exception. ---> System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load shared library 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies. In order to help diagnose loading problems, consider setting the LD_DEBUG environment variable: liblibSkiaSharp: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
